channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 11:47 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 11:47 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 11:30 A. Fluce in Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District-Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_.
